text: Grants to the District of Columbia under the acts referred to in § 38-1107 and under § 38-1109(b) and the earnings of sums appropriated under § 38- 1108 shall be shared equally between the Federal City College and the Washington Technical Institute.
historical:

1973 Ed., § 31-1610.

DC CODE § 38-1110

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Grants to Federal City College and Washington Technical Institute.
